initial_actions.title: Take the first step
initial_actions.subtitle: Select whether you want to create your own workspace or join the team.

join_workspace.title: Join a workspace
join_workspace.subtitle: Already part of a team? Use a QR code to join your Spanday PRO workspace.

create_workspace.title: Create a workspace
create_workspace.subtitle: Set up your space, add clients, and manage bookings with ease.

card.title: Next level starts here!
card.subtitle: Reach more clients, expand services, and grow your team with confidence.

starter.title: Unlock PRO
starter.subtitle: Your next level begins here. Step into PRO mode.

description.ios: Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account. Your subscription will automatically renew at your selected interval unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. After the introductory offer, the subscription renews at the standard price. The amount charged may change with notice. You can manage or cancel your subscription in your App Store account settings. Cancel anytime.
description.android: Payment will be charged to your Google Play account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. After any introductory offer, the subscription renews at the full price. The subscription price may change with notice. You can manage or cancel your subscription in your Google Play account settings. Cancel anytime.

anniversary.title: Anniversary!
anniversary.message:
Congratulations on your anniversary!
Wishing {{brandName}} continuous growth, inspiration, and new achievements. May each coming year be even more successful!

opening.title: Grand Opening!
opening.message:
Congratulations on your grand opening!
May your launch be bright, your customers loyal, and your brand quickly find its place in people’s hearts. Wishing you a successful journey ahead!

guide.title: Import guide
guide.warning: Rows with invalid or incorrectly formatted data will be skipped. If certain information is unavailable, leave the field empty.

fields.name: Email
options: Format: Must be a valid email address.

fields.name: Phone
options: Format: Include the international country code.

fields.name: Address
options: For example, 221B Baker Street, London, UK

fields.name: Avatar
options: Format: URL link to the image

all.subtitle: Enable receiving all brand notifications, not only those related to this staff member.
